title: If Scotland Ever Leaves U.K., What Stays Behind?
teaser: Robert Siegel talks with Andrew Tickell, author of the blog "Lallands Peat Worrier" and law lecturer at Glasgow Caledonian University. He's a supporter of Scottish independence and talks about how it might affect currency, armed forces, treaty obligations, regulations and law.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
